definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: He turned the heat up because it was very cold inside the house.
sentences.chinese: 他把暖氣開大了點，因爲屋裏非常冷。

sentences.english: The first thing that struck Georgiana when entering the laboratory was the hot furnace.
sentences.chinese: 走進實驗室後第一件讓她喫驚的事便是裏面的暖氣。

sentences.english: Silver-headed men sit around kerosene heaters.
sentences.chinese: 滿頭銀髮的男人圍坐在煤油暖氣機。

sentences.english: Yang Ling can dust the desks and chairs and Wu Ying will take care of the radiators.
sentences.chinese: 楊玲擦桌椅，吳英負責暖氣片。

sentences.english: If you get too chilly, there is a warming lobby.
sentences.chinese: 如果你凍着了，可以到休息室裏，那裏提供暖氣。

sentences.english: The radiator is out of control because of its long working hours.
sentences.chinese: 由於工作太長時間了，這個暖氣片已經失控了。

sentences.english: This heating system has an automatic temperature control.
sentences.chinese: 這個暖氣系統有自動溫控裝置。

sentences.english: The wire harness circuits for the heater-A/C control or the blend air door actuator.
sentences.chinese: 空調暖氣控制或混氣門引動器線束電路。

sentences.english: The coal fire in the hot-air heater quickly warmed the house.
sentences.chinese: 暖氣爐裏的煤火很快地使室內溫暖起來。

sentences.english: The two ends of the pipeline are connected with the radiator .
sentences.chinese: 管道的兩端與暖氣片相連接。

sentences.english: When the central- heating was installed, the fireplaces were walled up.
sentences.chinese: 安裝暖氣設備之後，便把壁爐封閉起來了。

sentences.english: Inside our house, the air-condition blow off warm wind keeping us warm and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在屋裏，暖氣機吹着暖氣，是我們溫暖舒適。

sentences.english: Inside our house, the air-condition blow off warm wind keeping us warm and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在屋裏，暖氣機吹着暖氣，是我們溫暖舒適。

sentences.english: On the vast earth warm winds gradually growing high.
sentences.chinese: 高天滾滾寒流急，大地微微暖氣吹。

sentences.english: Place radiator below the window sill to increase the wholeness of the space.
sentences.chinese: 利用飄窗下的空間放置暖氣，增加了空間的完整性。

sentences.english: Every winter night, she must borrow heating or electric blanket, can sleep.
sentences.chinese: 每年冬天的夜晚，她需藉着暖氣或電熱毯，才能入眠。

definition: air conditioning/air conditioner (including units that have a heating mode)/CL:臺|台[tai2]
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
to freeze to death/to die off in winter
to feel unwell/to suffer pain/to be difficult to bear
